idea-plugin.name: Solid Cherry Theme
idea-plugin.description:
JetBrains IDE dark theme based on `Darcula Solid` with extra darkness and a little bit of red. Inspired by `Material Black Cherry` theme for GNOME (and made to match it in the first place).

Installation

  • Go to Settings (Preferences) -> Plugins, find the theme plugin and install it
  • Restart IDE
  • Go to Settings (Preferences) -> Appearance & Behavior -> Appearance and see the Theme dropdown
